mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Web.Config.Html5MimeTypes
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Configures mimetypes for the next file extentions: .mp4, .m4v, .ogg, .ogv, .oga, .spx, .svg, .svgz, .eot, .otf, .woff, .appcache.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Prepares web.config for HTML5 and CSS3
